content.text:
# Screen Award for Best Female Playback

| caption       = The 2020 recipients: Shreya Ghoshal & Vaishali Mhade
| awarded_for    = Award for Best Female Playback singer
| presenter      = Screen India
| country        = India
| year           = Lata Mangeshkar,  Hum Aapke Hain Koun..! (1995)
| holder         = Shreya Ghoshal & Vaishali Mhade  Kalank (2020)
| website      =
}}
The Screen Award for Best Female Playback is chosen by a distinguished panel of judges from the Indian Bollywood film industry and the winners are announced in January.
Superlatives
holds the record of maximum awards in this category, with seven wins till 2020. She also holds the record of maximum nominations in this category, with twenty nominations till 2020.]]
